data.title: Cruise plus services & sales
data.meta_description: Reach decision-makers at Cruise Plus Services & Sales. Find their phone numbers & email addresses. It’s free. - Lusha
data.text:
Cruise Plus Services and Sales Inc., was founded to service the cruise line industry in Puerto Rico by Bruno Calenda. We are a well-established company and have been serving the shipping industry in Puerto Rico since 1996. Bruno began his career in the shipping industry in 1958 and have worked as Hotel Manager with Costa Cruise Line, Sitmar Cruises, and Princess Cruises. From 1976 to 1981, Bruno held the position of General Manager for Costa Cruise Line in San Juan, and later became General Manager of Marine Operations for Princess Cruises in the Caribbean, until Princess Cruises closed their San Juan operations office in 1996 and he was proposed to open a port agency and be Princess Cruises agent in Puerto Rico for which reason he founded Cruise Plus Services. Since then Cruise Plus Services and Sales Inc., has been port agent, stevedore provider and logistics service provider for Seven Seas, Princess Cruises, P&O Cruises, Crystal Cruises, V Ships, Oceania, Regent, NCL and Silver Sea Cruises. Our President and well trained management staff brings operational leadership, invoking clear and deliverable vision energizing each member of the team. We are updated and in touch with the changes in the marketplace, bringing innovation and adjusting to each client needs. No detail is too small, no request to large. We know ship operations and logistics. We follow the highest standards of services and safety. Our staff has the experience to meet all the company standards and vessel requirements. For over 20 years, Cruise Plus Services and Sales has been a leader in the shipping industry in Puerto Rico providing logistic coordination, port agency, equipment rental and stevedore service.

Read more
